Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotelapplication.backend.DatabaseManager
  • public class DatabaseManager
extends Object
    The DatabaseManager class provides static methods to interact with the Database class. It is responsible for managing hotel, user, and room data and provides utility methods for adding, removing, retrieving, and updating information.
    Author:
    Alexander Boutselis

        Returns:

        Returns:
        A list of all Hotel objects.

      • addOrUpdateHotel

        public static void addOrUpdateHotel​(Hotel hotel)
        Adds or updates a hotel in the database. If the hotel already exists, it is updated; otherwise, it is added.
        Parameters:
        hotel - The Hotel object to be added or updated.
